snippet: Construction starts on single-family homes surged 7 percent to an annual rate of 628,000 units in August, the highest level in six months.
abstract: Commerce Department says construction starts on single-family homes surged 7 percent to an annual rate of 628,000 units in August, highest level in six months.
lead_paragraph: Construction starts on single-family homes surged 7 percent to an annual rate of 628,000 units in August, the highest level in six months.

headline.main: Home Construction Rises, as Do Building Permits
headline.print_headline: Home Construction Rises, As Do Building Permits
